overview:
Stefan is a serial technology entrepreneur with more than 20 years experience in designing innovative enterprise software products. In his current role as CTO, Stefan focuses on product innovation and is the companyâ€™s key evangelist. He has consulted with hundreds of global companies and ISVs on best practices for web data integration and speaks frequently at industry events on topics such as enterprise software innovation and Web 2.0 trends.

In 1998, Stefan started Kapow.net <http://Kapow.net> , which became Europeâ€™s largest marketplace for luxury goods. He sold Kapow.net in 2001 to the largest bank in Denmark and took the intellectual property for the Web data extraction software platform that powered the site to start Kapow Software. He evolved that platform into an enterprise-class data integration solution, known today as the Kapow Katalyst.

Earlier in his career, Stefan spent five years with Advanced Visual Systems, where he worked on cutting-edge Java and visual programming projects. He graduated with honors from the Technical University of Denmark, the nationâ€™s top technical academic institution.

Today Stefan is Founder and CTO at Kapow Software
